subject: Baseball
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: “We Would Have Played for Nothing,” volume 2 of Fay Vincent’s oral-history project, has 11 stars from the 1950s and ’60s talking about their careers and their competitors.
snippet: “We Would Have Played for Nothing,” volume 2 of Fay Vincent’s oral-history project, has 11 stars from the 1950s and ’60s talking about their careers and their competitors.
